name: ICON ROUND
description:
SOPHISTICATED, OVERSIZED BUTTERFLY FRAME STYLE WITH DEFINED GEOMETRIC SHAPES. THE RIMS ARE CHARACTERIZED BY REFINED CONTOURING AND BEVELING, GIVING THE EYEWEAR AN ELEVATED LOOK ENHANCED BY THE NEW JEWEL-LIKE CUT OF THE T-LOGO.
 + SHINY ACETATE STYLE. TRIDIMENSIONAL T LOGO ON THE TEMPLES
 + INNER TEMPLE PLATE WITH TOM FORD LOGO
 + REFINED GOLDEN COLOUR DETAILS
 + LENSES BY ZEISS
 + 100% UV PROTECTION
 + SIZE: 53-19-140
 + MADE IN ITALY
 + DEDICATED PACKAGING WITH CROSS BODY POUCH
